lines.text:
[Sarcastically]
No? I thought he was lying in front of that fireplace to keep warm!

[Exasperated]
I never know what you're gonna do next.
Slowly but surely I'm getting an idea.

[to the bartender]
Yeah? Quick, Herman - the bromo!

[to Mugsy]
You knock on everything except the door, don't you?

[Trying to hit a note]
Me, me, me. How'd you like my execution?

[to Steve]
It won't do, my little man. You're the guy who switched fireside to homicide. Now you're goig to stick until Hammond's murderer is caught!
I'll be busy on the case for the next 48 hours.
Oh, no, no, no! Wedding bells and mysteries don't mix. When we start our honeymoon, the mystery's gonna be over.
